rules_text:
Nykthos, Architect of Gods has indestructible as long as you control at least three Shrines.
Whenever Nykthos attacks, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. If you do, search your library for a Shrine or legendary land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
notes:
Big Mana
 adjusted: Was a 4/4 for {2}{G}{U}.
